hymn.title: Take me Lord, and fill me with Your dear Self

layout.singingstanza: Take me Lord, and fill me with Your dear Self, Till my whole be -- ing is one with You. Lord, I'm will -- ing to o -- pen to You Eve -- ry mo -- ment in my life; Ful -- ly trust -- ing You, to live Your dream For Your rest and ex -- pres -- sion. Be -- side You I have no one In heav -- en or on the earth. To You, dear Lord, I give my all. I will not let You go. Make Your de -- sire my heart's de -- sire For our goal, the New Je -- ru -- sa -- lem.

lyrics.stanza: Take me Lord, and fill me with Your dear Self, Till my whole being is one with You. Lord, I'm willing to open to You Every moment in my life; Fully trusting You, to live Your dream For Your rest and expression.
Beside You I have no one In heaven or on the earth. To You, dear Lord, I give my all. I will not let You go. Make Your desire my heart's desire For our goal, the New Jerusalem.
